org.gbif.nameparser

Class NormalisedNameParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.nameparser.NormalisedNameParser

  • public class NormalisedNameParser
extends Object
    Core parser class of the name parser that tries to take a clean name into its pieces by using regular expressions. It runs the actual regex matching in another thread that stops whenever the configured timeout is reached.

    • Method Detail

      • parseNormalisedName

        public boolean parseNormalisedName(ParsedName cn,
                                   String scientificName,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Rank rank)
        Tries to parse a name string with the full regular expression. In very few, extreme cases names with very long authorships might cause the regex to never finish or take hours we run this parsing in a separate thread that can be stopped if it runs too long.
        Parameters:
        cn -
        scientificName -
        rank - the rank of the name if it is known externally. Helps identifying infrageneric names vs bracket authors
        Returns:
        true if the name could be parsed, false in case of failure

      • parseNormalisedNameIgnoreAuthors

        public boolean parseNormalisedNameIgnoreAuthors(ParsedName cn,
                                                String scientificName,
                                                @Nullable
                                                Rank rank)
        Parameters:
        cn -
        scientificName -
        rank - the rank of the name if it is known externally. Helps identifying infrageneric names vs bracket authors
        Returns:
        true if the name could be parsed, false in case of failure
